I.E. 1.4.1, or fc0ca62 (3dsx)

### If bug, Type of Bug:

Crash, math error, etc

### If bug, Steps to reproduce:

I.E. Buy clicker, save, re-enter, autosave. Clicker disappears.

Add new building or feature
